recipe.title: Japanese Soup Stock
ingredients: 2 (5-g) packages katsuo bushi (dried bonito flakes; 1 cup)
instructions: Wipe any sand or salt from kombu with a dampened cloth. Bring kombu and water just to a boil in a 3-quart saucepan over high heat. Remove kombu with tongs and reserve for another use.
Sprinkle katsuo bushi over liquid and remove pan from heat. Let stand 3 minutes, then pour through a cheesecloth-lined sieve into a bowl.
